settings.description:
Social Media is the fashion industry's BFF. It is not just for sharing pics, it's the ultimate recipe for models and the fashion industry. This is not a secret weapon anymore. If you wanna dominate the fashion scene, you gonna have to play it well. You have to connect with fans and collab with brands like a boss. 

Don’t have time? How to do it? Ease down! We are going to help you. With every post, story, and reel, we will create a wave of magic. We have got the secret sauce to take your online presence from “hmm” to “Wow.”

settings.title: Instagram Growth
settings.description: Get your Instagram Reeling! We drive engagement, followers, and overall vibe, making sure that you are always trending.

settings.title: Content Creation
settings.description: Get drool-worthy content! Be the star of every content that highlights your charisma and keeps your feed looking flawless.

settings.title: Portfolio Management
settings.description: Showcase your best self! Glam Models will organize and curate portfolios to climb the ladder higher.

settings.title: Digital Advertisement
settings.description: Get the brands calling! We plan targeted ad campaigns that put you front and center, catching the eye of top fashion and beauty brands.

settings.sub_text: Glam Models has got the inside scoop to take your social media to a new level. Let’s show the world what you have got in a captivating way.

settings.title: Expert team - We have got the know-how
settings.description: Our squad consists of the best professionals who know the modeling game in and out. We are talking about top-tier photographers, stylists, and coaches. From posing to portfolio creation, we have got your back.

settings.title: Experience Pros - We have seen it all
settings.description: Whether it is print or digital, we have been around the block. We have seen and done it all, and our track record speaks for itself. We are seasoned, savvy, and ready to share our wisdom with you.

settings.title: Unique Personalization - Exclusively for you
settings.description: One size fits all? Not here. We know every artist is unique, and we match their vibe. Whether you are a catwalk queen, a commercial star, or somewhere in between, we’ve got the perfect plan to make you shine.

settings.sub_text: We don’t just go by the name, we go by the work. We have our fair share in the successful stories of our clients. Yeah, we know the biz.

settings.title: Content Enhancement
settings.hover_content: Utilizing various content tactics, like stories, reels, photos, videos, and social posts, to keep your followers hooked.

settings.title: Bio Optimization
settings.hover_content: Crafting a compelling bio that attracts the audience and showcases your personality and story.

settings.title: Hashtag Optimization
settings.hover_content: Posting content along with a unique hashtag approach to make you trending on social media.

settings.title: Post Scheduling
settings.hover_content: Plan and schedule your posts at optimal times to reach the maximum audience.

settings.title: Instant Assistance
settings.hover_content: Get quick and reliable support whenever you need help with social media strategies or technical issues.

settings.title: Website Portfolio Creation
settings.hover_content: Creating a stunning portfolio that effectively showcases your best work and achievements.

settings.title: Monthly Analytics Report
settings.hover_content: Get detailed monthly reports giving you insight on clicks, likes, engagements, and views.

settings.title: Audience Interaction
settings.hover_content: Organizing proactive live sessions to engage with your followers to build a loyal base.

settings.title: Magazine Submission
settings.hover_content: Connecting with digital and print magazines to get published, increasing your credibility and reach.
settings.standard_plan_content: Confirm 1 issue with free digital copy
settings.premium_plan_content: Confirm 1 issue with free front cover, free digital copy

settings.title: Community Engagement
settings.hover_content: Arranging event participation to connect with key individuals and groups in the industry.

settings.title: Photoshoot
settings.hover_content: Regular photoshoot sessions for various magazines to give you the exposure you need.

settings.title: Pr Activities
settings.hover_content: Managing all the press activities and paparazzi to maintain a positive public image.

settings.sub_text: Here are a few areas of expertise we specialize in.

settings.title: Instagram Audit
settings.description: Get your Insta game on point with our analytical audit. We fetch the details like no one ever did and outline the needs accordingly.

settings.title: Understand Your Profile
settings.description: We’re gonna get all up in your profile, figuring out what makes you unique. Our experts will derive a perfect recipe for you to bring the spotlight on you.

settings.title: Implement the Right Strategy
settings.description: Our A-team of fashion gurus will get the campaign rolling for you, guiding you through the fashion maze like a boss.

settings.title: Revamp the Profile
settings.description: Glam Models is going to design eye-catching profiles that scream your unique style and tell your story in a way that is pure fire.

settings.title: Buzz Check
settings.description: Watch your popularity soar as we track the engagement on all your pics, videos, and stories. Planning and pacing accordingly to push you further.
